name: Dog Sitter!
description:
You play as a recently hired Dog Sitter from the local dog sitting website 'MoonDooger'. Do you have the patience and attention to properly give your assigned dog the correct foods?

This is my first 'full fledged' game  using Unity. It was completed for a final, but I gave it enough of a finish to upload on here. I learned A LOT of hard lessons and good lessons and I look forward to using Unity more for future projects.

Any and all feedback is welcome.
